interactions.name: Update Supplier SKU

action_ia_id.code:
// Update the form_data variable with the new supplier SKU
variables['48987b81-a383-443d-843c-e27f02622fd0'].supplier_sku = event.value;

interactions.name: Update Price

action_ia_id.code:
// Update the form_data variable with the new price
variables['48987b81-a383-443d-843c-e27f02622fd0'].price_cents = parseInt(event.value) || 0;
